author: andschwa
body: Requested by Jeffery. VSO create date - 10/7/2015 15:41:00

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
We are unsure if we want to bring this back, it's a lot of effort for seemingly little reward. On the other hand, since we can't distribute a test image (see #430), this may be desirable.

@FawcettJohnW Is there something better we can for people to preview the project? IMO building from source has the benefit of also demonstrating the ease that `dotnet-cli` and GitHub brought.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: We are not doing this. It provides no actual utility except for playing with a PowerShell prompt. A debian package per #516 will be much more useful.

title: Bring shell-in-a-box back up
